eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\Xi^{(1)} & = & t^4 \GG^{(1)} = \sum_j \lambda_j^{(1)} t^4 {\Lambda}_j
+ t^4 \left ({\cal S}_0({\cal K}_{\bf -1}) \right ) \nonumber \\
          & = & \sum_j \lambda_j^{(1)} t^4 {\Lambda}_j
+ t^4 \left ( {\cal S}_0 (\sum_r \rho^{(1)}_r {\cal K}_{{\bf -1},r} \right )
\, .
\label{inse9}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
t^4 \GG^{(1)} & = & \lambda_1^{(1)} \int d^4x \, G_{\mu\nu}^a G^{\mu\nu}_a 
\nonumber \\
&& + \rho_1^{(1)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \, 
\hat A^{a*}_\mu A^a_\mu ) 
   + \rho_2^{(1)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \, 
\omega^{a*} \omega^a ) 
   - \frac{1}{2} \rho_3^{(1)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \,( 
   \bar \eta \psi - \bar \psi \eta ) )\, .
\label{ym20}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta^{(n)} & = & \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \int d^4x \, 
\left ( \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} (-\partial^\mu \omega^a)
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4y \, 
\hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} ) 
\right . \nonumber \\
&& \left . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}  (-\partial^\mu \omega^a)
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( \int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b}
G_{\rho\sigma}^b )
\right . \nonumber \\
&& \left . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)} (-\partial^\mu \omega^a)
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( \int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi ) \right ) \nonumber \\
& = & - \int d^4x \, \partial^\mu \omega^a
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
\left [
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)}
{\cal S}_0 (\int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} ) 
\right . \nonumber \\
&  & ~~~~~~~~~~~ 
\left . + \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}
 \int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b} G_{\rho\sigma}^b 
+ \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)} \int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi \right ] \, .
\label{ym25}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
s \left ( \int d^4x \, \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} \right ) & = & 
\int d^4x \, \left ( - \epsilon^{abc} \partial_\mu \omega^b \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} -
\partial_\mu \omega^a \epsilon^{abc} \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^b} \right ) 
\nonumber \\
& & ~~~~~~~ - \int d^4x \, \partial_\mu \omega^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a}
(s H) \nonumber \\
& = & - \int d^4x \, \partial_\mu \omega^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a}
(s H)
\, .
\label{ym29}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal S}_0 \int d^4x \, \left ( - \partial_\mu \omega_a
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( {\cal H}_j ) \right ) = 
s \int d^4x \, \left ( - \partial_\mu \omega_a
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( {\cal H}_j ) \right ) = 0 \, , ~~~~~ j=2,3 \, .
\label{ym30}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
s \left ( \int d^4x \, A^a_\mu \frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} \right )
& = & \int d^4x \, \left ( \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^b \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + A_\mu^a s \frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a}
\right ) \nonumber \\
& = & \int d^4x \, \left ( \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^b \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + A_\mu^a [ s, \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a}] H + A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} (sH) 
\right ) \nonumber \\
& = & \int d^4x \, \left ( \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a}
+ A^a_\mu \frac{\delta}{\delta A^a_\mu} (sH) \right ) \, .
\label{ym31}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal H}_1 & = & - \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} 
\rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} \Big [ 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4x \, A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} ))
\nonumber \\
& & 
~~~~~~~~~ - {\cal S}_0 \Big ( \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d} \Big ) \nonumber \\
& & 
~~~~~~~~~ + {\cal S}_0 \Big ( \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\Big ) \nonumber \\
& & 
~~~~~~~~~ - {\cal S}_0 \Big ( \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d \Big )
\Big ] \nonumber \\
\label{ym35}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\tilde \zeta_{\bf 0}^{(n)} & = & 
- \int d^4x A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
\, \left [ 
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}  
\int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b} G_{\rho\sigma}^b 
+
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)}
\int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi \right ]
\nonumber \\
& & 
- \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} 
\int d^4x \, A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} )
\nonumber \\
& & 
+ \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} 
\rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} \Big (
 \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d}
%
 - \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\nonumber \\
% 
& & + \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d 
\Big ) \, .
\label{ym36}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
t^4 \GG^{(n)} & = & 
\lambda_1^{(n)} \int d^4x \, G_{\mu\nu}^a G^{\mu\nu}_a 
+ \rho_3^{(n)} \int d^4x \, i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi 
+ \rho_1^{(n)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \, \hat A^{a*}_\mu A^a_\mu ) 
\nonumber \\
& & 
+ \int d^4x A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
\, \left [ 
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}  
\int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b} G_{\rho\sigma}^b 
+
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)}
\int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi \right ]
\nonumber \\
& & 
+ \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} 
\int d^4x \, A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} )
\nonumber \\
& & 
- \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} 
\rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} \Big (
 \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d}
%
- \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\nonumber \\
% 
& & + \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d 
\Big ) \, .
\label{ym37}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& s_{-1} A_\mu^a = \partial_\mu \omega_a \, , ~~~~ s_{-1} \omega_a = 0 \, ,
\nonumber \\
&& s_0 A_\mu^a = \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^b \omega^c \, , ~~~~
s_0 \omega^a = -\frac{1}{2} \epsilon^{abc} \omega^b \omega^c \, .
\label{app9}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
s_{-1}  (\Delta'_n - s_0 \tilde \zeta'_n) & = &
s_{-1} \Delta'_n + s_0 s_{-1} \tilde \zeta'_n \nonumber \\
& = & s_{-1} \Delta'_n + s_0 (\Delta'_{n-1} - s_0 \tilde \zeta'_{n-1} )
\nonumber \\
& = & s_{-1} \Delta'_n + s_0 \Delta'_{n-1} \nonumber \\
& = & 0 \, .
\label{app19}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\tilde \zeta' & = &  - \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d}  \nonumber \\
& &  + \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\nonumber \\
& & 
-  \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d \, .
\label{app21}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Xi^{(1)} & = & t^4 \GG^{(1)} = \sum_j \lambda_j^{(1)} t^4 {\Lambda}_j
+ t^4 \left ({\cal S}_0({\cal K}_{\bf -1}) \right ) \nonumber \\
          & = & \sum_j \lambda_j^{(1)} t^4 {\Lambda}_j
+ t^4 \left ( {\cal S}_0 (\sum_r \rho^{(1)}_r {\cal K}_{{\bf -1},r} \right )
\, .
\label{inse9}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
t^4 \GG^{(1)} & = & \lambda_1^{(1)} \int d^4x \, G_{\mu\nu}^a G^{\mu\nu}_a 
\nonumber \\
&& + \rho_1^{(1)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \, 
\hat A^{a*}_\mu A^a_\mu ) 
   + \rho_2^{(1)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \, 
\omega^{a*} \omega^a ) 
   - \frac{1}{2} \rho_3^{(1)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \,( 
   \bar \eta \psi - \bar \psi \eta ) )\, .
\label{ym20}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta^{(n)} & = & \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \int d^4x \, 
\left ( \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} (-\partial^\mu \omega^a)
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4y \, 
\hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} ) 
\right . \nonumber \\
&& \left . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}  (-\partial^\mu \omega^a)
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( \int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b}
G_{\rho\sigma}^b )
\right . \nonumber \\
&& \left . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)} (-\partial^\mu \omega^a)
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( \int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi ) \right ) \nonumber \\
& = & - \int d^4x \, \partial^\mu \omega^a
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
\left [
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)}
{\cal S}_0 (\int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} ) 
\right . \nonumber \\
&  & ~~~~~~~~~~~ 
\left . + \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}
 \int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b} G_{\rho\sigma}^b 
+ \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)} \int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi \right ] \, .
\label{ym25}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
s \left ( \int d^4x \, \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} \right ) & = & 
\int d^4x \, \left ( - \epsilon^{abc} \partial_\mu \omega^b \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} -
\partial_\mu \omega^a \epsilon^{abc} \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^b} \right ) 
\nonumber \\
& & ~~~~~~~ - \int d^4x \, \partial_\mu \omega^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a}
(s H) \nonumber \\
& = & - \int d^4x \, \partial_\mu \omega^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a}
(s H)
\, .
\label{ym29}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal S}_0 \int d^4x \, \left ( - \partial_\mu \omega_a
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( {\cal H}_j ) \right ) = 
s \int d^4x \, \left ( - \partial_\mu \omega_a
\frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} ( {\cal H}_j ) \right ) = 0 \, , ~~~~~ j=2,3 \, .
\label{ym30}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
s \left ( \int d^4x \, A^a_\mu \frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} \right )
& = & \int d^4x \, \left ( \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^b \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + A_\mu^a s \frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a}
\right ) \nonumber \\
& = & \int d^4x \, \left ( \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^b \omega^c 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a} + A_\mu^a [ s, \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a}] H + A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} (sH) 
\right ) \nonumber \\
& = & \int d^4x \, \left ( \partial_\mu \omega_a 
\frac{\delta H}{\delta A_\mu^a}
+ A^a_\mu \frac{\delta}{\delta A^a_\mu} (sH) \right ) \, .
\label{ym31}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal H}_1 & = & - \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} 
\rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} \Big [ 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4x \, A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} ))
\nonumber \\
& & 
~~~~~~~~~ - {\cal S}_0 \Big ( \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d} \Big ) \nonumber \\
& & 
~~~~~~~~~ + {\cal S}_0 \Big ( \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\Big ) \nonumber \\
& & 
~~~~~~~~~ - {\cal S}_0 \Big ( \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d \Big )
\Big ] \nonumber \\
\label{ym35}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\tilde \zeta_{\bf 0}^{(n)} & = & 
- \int d^4x A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
\, \left [ 
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}  
\int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b} G_{\rho\sigma}^b 
+
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)}
\int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi \right ]
\nonumber \\
& & 
- \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} 
\int d^4x \, A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} )
\nonumber \\
& & 
+ \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} 
\rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} \Big (
 \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d}
%
 - \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\nonumber \\
% 
& & + \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d 
\Big ) \, .
\label{ym36}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
t^4 \GG^{(n)} & = & 
\lambda_1^{(n)} \int d^4x \, G_{\mu\nu}^a G^{\mu\nu}_a 
+ \rho_3^{(n)} \int d^4x \, i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi 
+ \rho_1^{(n)} {\cal S}_0 (\int d^4x \, \hat A^{a*}_\mu A^a_\mu ) 
\nonumber \\
& & 
+ \int d^4x A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
\, \left [ 
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)} \lambda_1^{(j)}  
\int d^4y \, G^{\rho\sigma b} G_{\rho\sigma}^b 
+
\sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_3^{(j)}
\int d^4y \, 
i \bar \psi D \!\!\!\! \slash \psi \right ]
\nonumber \\
& & 
+ \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} \rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} 
\int d^4x \, A_\mu^a \frac{\delta}{\delta A_\mu^a} 
{\cal S}_0 ( \int d^4y \, \hat A^{b*}_\nu A^{\nu b} )
\nonumber \\
& & 
- \sum_{j=1}^{n-1} 
\rho_1^{(n-j)}\rho_1^{(j)} \Big (
 \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d}
%
- \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\nonumber \\
% 
& & + \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d 
\Big ) \, .
\label{ym37}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& s_{-1} A_\mu^a = \partial_\mu \omega_a \, , ~~~~ s_{-1} \omega_a = 0 \, ,
\nonumber \\
&& s_0 A_\mu^a = \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^b \omega^c \, , ~~~~
s_0 \omega^a = -\frac{1}{2} \epsilon^{abc} \omega^b \omega^c \, .
\label{app9}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
s_{-1}  (\Delta'_n - s_0 \tilde \zeta'_n) & = &
s_{-1} \Delta'_n + s_0 s_{-1} \tilde \zeta'_n \nonumber \\
& = & s_{-1} \Delta'_n + s_0 (\Delta'_{n-1} - s_0 \tilde \zeta'_{n-1} )
\nonumber \\
& = & s_{-1} \Delta'_n + s_0 \Delta'_{n-1} \nonumber \\
& = & 0 \, .
\label{app19}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\tilde \zeta' & = &  - \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{g^2} ( \square A^d_\rho - \partial_\rho (\partial A)^d ) A^{\rho d}  \nonumber \\
& &  + \int d^4x \, 
\frac{2}{g^2} \epsilon^{dlm} A^l_\sigma (\partial_\rho A^m_\sigma -
					 \partial_\sigma A^m_\rho) A^d_\rho 
\nonumber \\
& & 
-  \int d^4x \, 
\frac{1}{4g^2} \epsilon^{vqk}\epsilon^{krd} A_\sigma^q A_\sigma^r 
A_\rho^v A_\rho^d \, .
\label{app21}
\
